item.title: Report X-2024081589
item.description:
Report X-2024081589

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-27T06:25:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-20
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 8/19/2024 at approximately 2100, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 3667328 at the station in Portland, reporting undeclared dangerous goods. The shipment consisted of a polystyrene package, containing various food items packed on wet ice, along with two plastic containers of "Multi-Clor". The outer packaging appeared to colapse under the weight, exposing the shipment's contents. An online safety data sheet, retrieved by Dangerous Goods Administration, classified "Multi-Clor" as UN 1791 Hypochlorite solution. The shipment was not prepared in accordance with IATA Regulations, as it was not completed with the required markings, labeling, packaging or paperwork. The shipment is being held, pending an FAA investigation.

item.description:

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE FOUND LEAKING IN THE EAST UNLOAD DOOR 26. CALL MADE TO PSC FOR CLEAN UP. RESPONDER WENT TO THE DOOR FOLLOWED THE SMALL PACKAGE DECISON TREE AND DONNED PPE. PACKAGE AND RELATED MATERIAL WAS CLEANED UP AND BROUGHT TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024081495
item.description:
Report X-2024081495

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-23T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-25
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED ON THE IRREGULAR BELT. RESPONDER NOTICED THE OUTER WALL OF BOX INDICATED IT WAS EITHER LEAKING FROM WITHIN OR LEAKED ON BY AN OUTSIDE SOURCE. RESPONDER HAD PPE ON AND BROUGHT THE BOX TO THE PSC. UPON OPENING THE BOX, IT WAS DETERMINED THE "WICKED FOAM N'FRESH" WAS THE SOURCE. DAMAGE INSPECTION; NON HAZARDOUS LEAKER; NO LEAK TO NAIL PRODUCTS. THE (3) NAIL PRODUCTS ARE ACETONE FREE BUT CONTAIN HIGHLY FLAMMABLE ISOBUTYL NITRATE. BOTTLES LABELED FLAMMABLE / HIGHLY FLAMMABLE. REQUESTED SAFETY DATA SHEETS SEVERAL TIMES BUT DID NOT RECEIVE THEM FROM THE SHIPPER.

item.description:

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-09

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RIPPED BAG FOUND BY PD-5 UNDERSLIDE. INSPECTION DURING REPACKING/RETAPING REVEALED IT CONTAINED FIRE EXTINGUISHERS AND NO DIAMOND HAZARD LABELS. UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROTOCOL FOLLOWED. REWRAP; NO LEAK.

item.title: Report X-2024081395
item.description:
Report X-2024081395

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-22T18:16:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-05
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO LEAKER IN UNLOAD, WHICH TURNED OUT TO BE SOUP BASE. UPON INSPECTION OF AN AFFECTED PACKAGE, DISCOVERED 3 AEROSOL CANS INSIDE, WITH NO LIMITED QUANTITY WARNING STICKER. UPS PROTOCOL FOR A POTENTIALLY UNDECLARED HAZMAT WAS INITIATED.
